
##DE Analysis
```{r include=FALSE}
design = model.matrix(~Outcome, data = pData(gseset))
fit = lmFit(M_log2 , design)
fit = eBayes(fit)

tT_15852 <- topTable(fit, n = Inf, adjust.method = "BH", sort.by = "P") 
tT_15852
library(DT)
DT::datatable(round(tT_15852[1:100, ], 2))
```

```{r}
ggplot(tT_15852 , aes(x = AveExpr, y = logFC))+
    geom_point(aes(colour=-log10(P.Value)), alpha=1/3, size=1) +
    scale_colour_gradient(low="blue",high="red") +
    ylab("log10 fold change") + xlab("Average expression")
```

```{r}
logFC_threshold <- 2       
p_value_threshold <- 0.01 

k1 <- (tT_15852$adj.P.Val < p_value_threshold) & (tT_15852$logFC < -logFC_threshold)
k2 <- (tT_15852$adj.P.Val < p_value_threshold) & (tT_15852$logFC > logFC_threshold)

DEG <- mutate(tT_15852, change = ifelse(k1, "down", ifelse(k2, "up", "stable")))

table(DEG$change)

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = DEG, 
            aes(x = logFC, 
                y = -log10(P.Value))) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.4, size = 3.5, 
             aes(color = change)) +
  ylab("-log10(Pvalue)")+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("blue4", "grey", "red3"))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = c(-logFC, logFC), lty = 4, col = "black", lwd = 0.8) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = -log10(P.Value), lty = 4, col = "black", lwd = 0.8) +
  theme_bw()
```

## New 10-April
```{r}
pData(gseset)$gradeFactor <- factor(
  pData(gseset)$`grade:ch1`, 
  levels = c("normal", "grade 1", "grade 2", "grade 3")
)
table(pData(gseset)$gradeFactor)
```

```{r}
anova_result <- aov(M_log2[1, ] ~ pData(gseset)$gradeFactor)
summary(anova_result)
tukey_result <- TukeyHSD(anova_result)
print(tukey_result)
```

```{r}
anova_result <- aov(M_log2[100, ] ~ pData(gseset)$gradeFactor)
summary(anova_result)
tukey_result <- TukeyHSD(anova_result)
print(tukey_result)
```
```{r echo=FALSE}
significant_genes <- list()
count <- 0
significant_indices <- c()

for (i in 1:22283) {
  # ANOVA Test
  anova_result <- aov(M_log2[i, ] ~ pData(gseset)$gradeFactor)
  p_value <- summary(anova_result)[[1]]$"Pr(>F)"[1]
  
  if (!is.na(p_value) && p_value < 0.05) {
    count <- count + 1
    # TukeyHSD post mortem
    tukey_result <- TukeyHSD(anova_result)
    tukey_df <- as.data.frame(tukey_result$`pData(gseset)$gradeFactor`)
  
    comparisons <- c("grade 1-normal", "grade 2-normal", "grade 3-normal")
    if (all(comparisons %in% rownames(tukey_df)) && 
        all(tukey_df[comparisons, "p adj"] < 0.05)) {
      significant_genes[[rownames(M_log2)[i]]] <- tukey_df[comparisons, ]
      significant_indices <- c(significant_indices, i)  
    }
  }
}
M_log2_ANOVA <- M_log2[significant_indices, ]
cat("Dimension of M_log2_ANOVA:", dim(M_log2_ANOVA), "\n")
significant_gene_names <- rownames(M_log2)[significant_indices]
```

```{r}
library(caret)
library(e1071)

svm_model <- train(
  Outcome ~ .,
  data = train_data,                   
  method = "svmLinear",                
  trControl = trControl,
  tuneGrid = data.frame(C = c(0.1, 1, 10)) 
)
```
